nested.callback: const dmg = monster.weapon?.damage || ''; const m = dmg.match(/^[0-9]+d[0-9]+(?:[+-][0-9]+)*\s*(.*)$/); return m?.[1]?.trim() || '-';

nested.heading: Features

diceParsing.desc: Parses comma-separated dice expressions, ignores spaces, supports XdY, XdY+Z, chained dice, and standalone numbers. Each comma-separated chunk becomes one rollable.
